nodes.text: The Ryn were a humanoid sentient species with white hair and prehensile tails. They were known to be itinerant and were rarely seen in the Core Worlds. Shortly before the end of the Clone Wars, two Ryn followed Lyra Erso only to offer a scintillating pendant.

James Luceno created the Ryn for the Legends novel The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos I: Hero's Trial. Luceno also introduced the species to canon when he included a pair of them in Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel.
